title: Multidisciplinary, non-pharmacological breathlessness intervention service for patients with moderately severe to severe COPD: a randomised controlled trial.
abstract: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) is an often-progressive respiratory disease associated with disabling breathlessness. Breathlessness intervention services (BIS), which coach patients to self-manage breathlessness using non-pharmacological strategies, are effective in a variety of populations, including those with cancer and serious respiratory disease. This study aimed to compare the impact of the Westmead Breathlessness Service in people with moderate to severe COPD.
